Are you a coward, as they were? Or will you join us as one who commands the mightiest element?\\n\\n ","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Staff of Fire (+3)","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"- - - - - - - - - - -","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Fire Sigil III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Fire Spell","color":"#FF0000"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Redstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Burns a symbol into the ground on casting. 12 seconds later, it bursts into flame in a 4-block radius; Any entities caught in the radius are set on fire.","color":"black"}]','["",{"text":"Throw Flames III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Fire Spell","color":"#FF0000"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Glowstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"You hurl flames at your foes. Any entity in a 12-block cone in front of you is set on fire.","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n\\n- - - - - - - - - - -","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Meteor","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Fire Spell","color":"#FF0000"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Primordial Stone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Invoke the fire of the skies. {pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Air (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"#F7D790"},{"text":"\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"     <","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" ^","color":"gold"},{"text":"  x\\n            ","color":"reset"},{"text":" o","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"#F7D790"},{"text":" - Ambient Crystal\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Brightsteel Ingot\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Staff of Air (+2)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Bottle o\' Dreams","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"I used to be someone who wrote down everything. But things change.\\n\\nI\'ll be moving on soon, to smaller and better things. But I can\'t help but wonder...\\n "}','["",{"text":"Does anyone really understand "},{"text":"Air","color":"#EBD245"},{"text":" as Travelers do?\\n\\nI can tell you that the ancients did not.\\n\\nThough they breathed it, they did not understand it. Live it.\\n\\n\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"...\\nIf they had - Strict legionnaires, stuffy archivists, sea cultists, any of them -\\n\\nHow might things have turned out differently?\\n\\nI suppose we\'ll never know.\\n- E\\n "}','["",{"text":"Staff of Air (+3)","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"- - - - - - - - - - -","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Updraft III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Air Spell","color":"#B9B941"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Redstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"A 3-block radius wind column is created for 36 seconds. {pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Earth (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"dark_green"},{"text":"\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" I","color":"#C46C1E"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gray"},{"text":"     <","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"  x\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"green"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" - Tangleheart\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"#C46C1E"},{"text":" - Copper Ingot\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n--->","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"^ - Staff of Earth (+2)\\n"},{"text":"o","color":"gold"},{"text":" - Enchanted Golden Apple","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Breathe.\\nRemember the trees, the mountains.\\nBreathe.\\nThere is much left to do.\\nBreathe.\\nWithin your deepest self, "},{"text":"Earth","color":"dark_green"},{"text":" remains.\\nBreathe.\\nRemember who you are, who you used to be, and breathe out.\\n\\n- Thren","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"Staff of Earth (+3)","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"- - - - - - - - - - -","color":"black"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Natural Armor III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Earth Spell","color":"dark_green"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Redstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"This spell grants you magical armor; They idle for 48 seconds, and anyone who stands near them gains ","color":"black"},{"text":"Haste III","color":"reset","bold":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":"+60% Mining Speed, +30% Attack Speed"}},{"text":" for 8 minutes.","color":"black"}]','["",{"text":"Return","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Earth Spell","color":"dark_green"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Garden Shard","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Casting this spell plants a flower where you are standing. When you next cast the spell, you return to the place it was planted.","color":"black"}]'],title:Breathe,author:Thren,generation:1}

{pages:['["",{"text":"Staff of Water (+3)\\n             "},{"text":"^","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":"\\n          x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"aqua"},{"text":"  x\\n       x  ","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":"     <","color":"gray"},{"text":"  x\\n          x ","color":"reset"},{"text":" ^","color":"blue"},{"text":"  x\\n             ","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"^","color":"dark_blue"},{"text":" - Heart of the Sea\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"I","color":"aqua"},{"text":" - Diamond\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":">","color":"light_purple"},{"text":" - Draft of the Prism\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"<","color":"gray"},{"text":" - Forgotten Runestone\\n--->","color":"reset"}]','["",{"text":"^","color":"blue"},{"text":" - Staff of Water (+2)\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"o","color":"dark_aqua"},{"text":" - Everglacier [Concentration III]","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"My dearest Grace,\\n\\nWould that I had time enough to write all I wish, but I know not when I will next make port; This, my love, must be enough for now.\\n\\nThree weeks ago,\\n "}','{"text":"we docked The Crane in this uncanny land. The mists grow thick here, and the trees stranger than I have seen.\\n\\nWhile we are beset by dangers at every turn, I cannot help myself; The spirit of adventure calls me onward."}','["",{"text":"I wonder if you would think the same.\\nIn this furthest north, the sea is riddled with glaciers, and the land with deep snowfall.\\n\\nBut at sea, Grace, at sea!\\n\\nThe "},{"text":"Water","color":"blue"},{"text":" feels alive!\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"Like the very ocean calls out to my innermost being. \'Press on\'!\\nE has asked me to write that they miss you terribly.\\n\\nThe poor dear does not handle the cold well.\\n "}','{"text":"My dear, I cannot tell if the lands beyond will be merciful.\\n\\nBut I could not let this voyage be in vain.\\n\\nKeep with you this formula. Anston thinks it is the most important we have found so far."}','{"text":"I will be with you again, be it land, sea, or god that stands between us.\\n\\nKeep safe, my love.\\n\\nI will be home before you know it.\\n\\n- Mel <3"}','["",{"text":"Staff of Water (+3)\\n- - - - - - - - - - -\\n"},{"text":"Nourishment III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Water Spell","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Redstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\nWhen cast while standing on ","color":"reset"},{"text":"crops","bold":true,"hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":"(Wheat, Potatoes, Carrots, or Beets)"}},{"text":",","color":"reset","hoverEvent":{"action":"show_text","contents":"(Wheat, Potatoes, Carrots, or Beets)"}},{"text":" this spell encourages them to grow in a 3x3 cube centered on you.\\n "}]','["",{"text":"Extinguish III","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Water Spell","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Glowstone","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"This spell extinguishes any entities within a 20-block radius of you that are ","color":"black"},{"text":"burning.","color":"red"}]','["",{"text":"Flush","underlined":true},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Water Spell","color":"blue"},{"text":"\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"Component: Mysterious Fish","color":"gray"},{"text":"\\n\\n","color":"reset"},{"text":"This spell removes all status effects from each entity in a 10-block radius.","color":"black"}]'],title:"Lost Coast",author:Mel,generation:1}
